channel.title: The Vampris Saber
channel.description: This sword is for the vampire queen on the server I'm creating :P Tell me what everyone thinks! [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/VamprisSaberFront.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/VamprisSaberFront.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/VamprisSaberSide.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/VamprisSaberSide.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/VamprisSaberSide2.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/VamprisSaberSide2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/Screenshot2.png.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/Screenshot2.png[/img][/URL] [b]Update thanks to Amy :) : Improved Color Scheme and Reduced Poly.[/b] [URL=http://s1197.photobucket.com/user/austinl28/media/update.png.html][IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa439/austinl28/update.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: The Vampris Saber
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Mystical_Wizard, post:5, topic:544598”]Thank you Amy and I tried and tried to decrease the Poly count but it’s troubling due to all of the existing objects

If you wouldn’t mind could you add me on skype or something and show me how I would go about decreasing the poly count further? Also I would appreciate it if you could add some opinions about the recoloring of the model. I’m striving to get better at what I do but I’m limited in the program I use. And I’m fairly lazy so I couldn’t bother to learn another program such as blender. Inbox me if you want/can help! Thanks :P[/quote]
Pm me your skype name and i’ll add you, there are many ways to go around lower poly that i could show you without any hassles. I’ll explain about colours once i’ve added you, it is a little tricky and boring to explain via a long wall of text so i’d have to show you.

Read full topic

item.title: The Vampris Saber
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yeah the orb on the bottom could somehow be linked to the one on the top (not literally). It’d be like the concept of the power flowing through the sword instead of it being concentrated on the bottom.
As for coding/programming you should look into some tutorials on basic java, even if it’s just for a refresher. then you can work on the more in depth ones and what not. Don’t forget the server/client help sections are there for you to use :3

Read full topic

item.title: The Vampris Saber
item.dc:creator: @Mystical_Wizard Mystical_Wizard
item.description:
@Mystical_Wizard wrote:

sk8rdude461:

I do like the model you made and it looks nice. I’m no modeller and I cannot give any realistic criticism on it and I’m sorry on that. I think it’d be cool to add a red “blood gem” into the center of the black diamond shape on the blade.

I have an orb within the claw’s grasp on the bottom of the hilt. Would it look better with a ruby on the blade itself? Keep in mind I have about 3 or more weapons I need to create for the custom bosses I’m adding to my server that’s in development. One thing I do wish though… I wish I had more experience in coding java… It’s very difficult for me to start off from a blank source and client striving to create a brand new unique server that no one else will experience in the RSPS community. Especially since I’m doing it by myself lol.

Read full topic

item.title: The Vampris Saber
item.dc:creator: @Mystical_Wizard Mystical_Wizard
item.description:
@Mystical_Wizard wrote:

Thank you Amy and I tried and tried to decrease the Poly count but it’s troubling due to all of the existing objects

If you wouldn’t mind could you add me on skype or something and show me how I would go about decreasing the poly count further? Also I would appreciate it if you could add some opinions about the recoloring of the model. I’m striving to get better at what I do but I’m limited in the program I use. And I’m fairly lazy so I couldn’t bother to learn another program such as blender. Inbox me if you want/can help! Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: The Vampris Saber
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

This is a unique design, which is a good start. It is good to see someone new on the scene trying their best to improve, its refreshing. The only problems i have are with the poly count, there are areas around the middle design and the hilt that don’t need that much poly. I’d also suggest working on your colouring, but that is entirely up to you as it isn’t bad but it could look more realistic if you wanted to try.

All in all i like it, but these few touch ups could make it that much better. Good job, keep it up.

Read full topic
